info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 06 at 9:41PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Luna County through 1030 PM MDT... At 940 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles east of Sunshine, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sunshine, Rock Hound State Park and Spring Canyon State Park. This includes Interstate 10 in New Mexico between mile markers 94 and 96. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
